summary: Snapdragon is a type of computer chip made by Qualcomm for phones and other devices. It uses ARM technology and includes a processor, modem, and Wi-Fi. The first Snapdragon, released in 2007, had the first 1 GHz mobile phone processor. In 2011, Qualcomm improved the design with "Krait," letting the processor adjust its speed. Later, they created different series (200, 400, 600, and 800) for various device needs. Recently, Snapdragon chips have been used in laptops too.
title: Qualcomm Snapdragon
